notes: Landlock newsletter #5 (May 2025) detailing new Linux ABI features, audit logging for denied requests, and Rust crate updates for sandboxing.
Youki Rust OCI runtime changelog highlighting 2025 additions like exec CPU affinity support and Wasm executor fixes relevant to container isolation.
Wasmtime 31.0.0 release notes (March 2025) covering SIMD completion, stack switching work, and runtime guard adjustments for WebAssembly sandboxing.
Wasmtime 28.0.0 release notes (Dec 2024) documenting signals-based trap configuration and guard region tuning impacting isolation guarantees.
Firecracker changelog for v1.13.0 (2024) describing microVM isolation enhancements like PCI support and diff snapshots.
